classes.Pet: Pet class. Moves to a new home already neutered/spayed, not for breeding.
classes.Breed: Kitten with breeding rights. Suitable for breeding programs.
classes.Show: Show class. Breed standard, suitable for exhibitions and breeding.

statuses.Available: The kitten is free and ready to meet future owners.
statuses.Reserved: A deposit has been paid; the kitten is awaiting the move to a new family.
statuses.UnderObservation: We are currently observing the kitten's development. It may become available later.
statuses.Sold: The kitten has already found its home.
